commits.message: Before registering an input method, make sure its ime.json file exists.
Add PIMELauncher - a launcher and monitor for the python server (automatically restart the server if it crashes).
Statically link VC++ runtime for release builds.
Update README.md and fix incorrect file paths.
Fix the NSIS installer and change its encoding to UTF-8 with BOM.
Remove the unused woof input method.
Handle candidate list for the chewing input method module.
Little fix.
Port chewing input method to python (work in progress).
Add a basic skeleton for porting chewing input method.
Make the UI of the candidate window and keys used to select candidates customizable.
Make the python binding of libchewing support Windows dll files.

* Make event handling of the client side more efficient.
* Cache icons of language bar buttons.
* Fix an "off-by-one" error in LangBarButton::setText().

* Support windows 8 systray mode icon.
* Fix bugs in preserved key handling.

* Implement addButton(), removeButton(), addPreservedKey(), and removePreservedKey().
* Add new API: changeButton() used to update the status of a language bar button.
* Fix an "off-by-one" error in LangBarButton::setText().
Refactor and reduce unnecessary data in the IPC json object.
Code cleanup.
Remove unnecessary files.

1. Re-org the folder structure. 2. Add WoofTextService as another sample 3. Add IMServiceMgr to enumerate installed input method for client/server usage. 4. Add 2 attributes in JSON for IMServiceMgr instantiating service instance.
Fix python 3 compatibility and UTF-8 encoding problems of json files.
Allow dynamic loading of different input method modules.
Allow dynamic loading of different input method modules.
Fix python 3 compatibility and UTF-8 encoding problems of json files.
Rename from NodeIme to PIME.
Add username to the path of the named pipe to avoid name clashes.
Avoid using Chinese filenames.
Move cursor correctly.
Handle relative path of icon files in ime.json file.
Support showing candidate list.
Handle requests from the server (not fully working now).
Add a simple python text service and update composition strings propoerly.
Use named pipe to implement IPC and using rapidjson to handle json format.
Use named pipe to implement IPC and using rapidjson to handle json format.
Add a basic skeleton of server written in python and fix some IPC bugs.
Improve client/server IPC.
Add KeyEvent class to the python server.
Maintain the status of TextService in the server.
Set security attributes on the pipe properly so IPC from metro mode works.
Set security attributes on the pipe properly so IPC from metro mode works.
Maintain the status of TextService in the server.
Add KeyEvent class to the python server.
Improve client/server IPC.
Use named pipe to implement IPC and using rapidjson to handle json format.
Add a basic skeleton of server written in python and fix some IPC bugs.
WIP
Support opening items in the bookmarks menu in new tabs or new windows.
Port some missing config options from the gtk+ version of pcmanfm.
Add new signal prepareFileMenu() to Fm::SidePane and Fm::DirTree so there's  a chance to customize the file menu before its shown.
Port some missing config options from the gtk+ version of pcmanfm.
Add new signal prepareFileMenu() to Fm::SidePane and Fm::DirTree so there's  a chance to customize the file menu before its shown.
Port some missing config options from the gtk+ version of pcmanfm.
Port some missing config options from the gtk+ version of pcmanfm.
Add an option to automatically turn on numlock after login (implemented in lxqt-session).
Support automatically turning on numlock after login (X11 only).
Update translations.
Also show hidden dirs in the directory tree when the "Show Hidden" option in the menu is turned on.
Fix #190 - Column layout is not always updated.

Allow adding or removing paths in the file search dialog.
Fix bugs in searching for documents.
Fix relative paths in command line arguments. Close lxde/pcmanfm-qt#170 - relative paths stated by xdg-open not considered.
Update the About dialog.
Port missing "Dock" options from obconf gtk+ version.
Support changing the name of desktops.
Store side pane mode setting, #157.
Install SIGTERM handler to save settings when logging out, #157.
Create New menu actions, context menu in tree side pane, #163.

Fix warnings reported by scan-build.

scan-build was called like this:
cmake -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=/usr/share/clang/scan-build-3.5/ccc-analyzer \
-DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=/usr/share/clang/scan-build-3.5/c++-analyzer \
-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug ../lxqt/pcmanfm-qt
scan-build make

Fix warnings reported by cppcheck.

cppcheck was called like this:
_builddir=.
_srcdir=../lxqt/pcmanfm-qt
cppcheck --enable=all \
  -DQ_DECL_IMPORT="" -DQ_DECL_EXPORT="" -DLIBFM_QT_API="" -DCUSTOM_ACTIONS \
  -ULIBFM_QT_COMPILATION \
  -I$_builddir/pcmanfm -I$_builddir/libfm-qt \
  -I$_srcdir/pcmanfm -I$_srcdir/libfm-qt \
  $(find $_srcdir -name '*.cpp')
Fix some memory leaks reported by valgrind.
Merge branch 'static_checking' of https://github.com/ufleisch/pcmanfm-qt into ufleisch-static_checking

Uses LXQt lxqt_translate_ts() to handle translations

It doesn't introduce any dependence on LXQt.
CMake modules copied from liblxqt (https://github.com/lxde/liblxqt).
Instructions on how to use here:
https://github.com/lxde/liblxqt/commit/c8a513bd0845c06e7761c74403fd2bf00cd3a6b4

Handles .desktop files translations

Closes lxde/pcmanfm-qt#186.

Updates translations

WARNING: template filenames changed:
    libfm-qt_template.ts -> fm-qt.ts
    pcmanfm-qt_template.ts -> pcmanfm-qt.ts
